segments.text: Observing this, the sink's basin is full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflowing water is making a real mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's standing there, apron on, plate in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not reacting to the puddle at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me sad thinking of the cleanup ahead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kid on the stool is reaching way up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar's open, he's pulling out a handful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's poised to catch one, looking excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so sneaky, it's almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the tilting stool has me worried sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the window frames a lovely garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled aside, light streaming in.
segments.speaker: PAR
